title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CPU/GPU runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other GGUF models with a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm install ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (pip install ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip install langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (Docker run) with chat history, model management & OpenAI-compatible endpoint toggle.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central) offering sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI for interactive chat, model pulling & conversation history stored locally.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection & PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async API and native JSON streaming.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with dependency injection helpers and minimal API sample.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards or continue writing via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate (crates.io/ollama-rs) with Tokio async and streaming support.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that proxies OpenAI SDK calls to Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (pip install ollama-haystack) to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers DMs and mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Swift menubar app for macOS to start/stop Ollama services and monitor GPU usage.
